articles.title: Trump threatens to revoke citizenship of US comedian Rosie O'Donnell
articles.description: Donald Trump is considering revoking the citizenship of Rosie O'Donnell [1, 2, 3].

articles.title: Israeli forces kill 110 Palestinians in Gaza as truce talks falter
articles.description: Israeli forces have killed 110 Palestinians in Gaza amidst stalled truce talks [1].

articles.title: Trump announces 30% tariffs against EU and Mexico to begin Aug 1
articles.description: Donald Trump has announced 30% tariffs on all goods from the EU and Mexico, set to begin on August 1 [2, 3, 4].
